alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Northern Black Hills; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 4:29PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN MEADE AND CENTRAL PENNINGTON COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM MDT... At 428 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Black Hawk, or 7 miles northwest of Rapid City, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Northern Rapid City, western Rapid Valley, Black Hawk, and Summerset. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 48 and 61. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Northern Black Hills; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
